mapper.sql: tt_id, start_station, des_station, a_id, t_id, go_off, arrive_time, start_place, des_place
mapper.select: select * from train_ticket tt join train_seat ts on tt.tt_id = ts.tt_id where ts.seat_state = false limit #{start},#{limit}
select * from train_ticket tt join train_seat ts on tt.tt_id = ts.tt_id where ts.seat_state = true
select * from train_ticket tt join train_seat ts on tt.tt_id = ts.tt_id where ts.seat_state = true limit #{start},#{limit}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into train_ticket (start_station, des_station, a_id, t_id, go_off, arrive_time, start_place, des_place) values (#{startStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{trainNum.trainNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goOff,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{arriveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

start_station,

a_id,

mapper.update:
update train_ticket
start_station = #{startStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
des_station = #{desStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
a_id = #{aId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
train_no = #{trainNum.trainNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
go_off = #{goOff,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
arrive_time = #{arriveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
start_place = #{startPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
des_place = #{desPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where tt_id = #{ttId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update train_ticket set start_station = #{startStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, des_station = #{desStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_id = #{aId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, train_no = #{trainNum.trainNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, go_off = #{goOff,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, arrive_time = #{arriveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, start_place = #{startPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, des_place = #{desPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where tt_id = #{ttId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
